title: electronic Long-Term Services and Supports Implementation Guide
introduction: electronic Long-Term Services and Supports Implementation Guide was developed to support exchange of data generated during the planning and provision of long-term services and supports and is currently scoped to data commonly found on LTSS service plans.

list.desc:
STU #2. This update addresses the following Jira trackers that were deemed by the HL7 CBCP WG to be non-substantial changes:
1) Add clarification text to CarePlan.partOf.comment [FHIR-23046](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-23046).
2) Clarify wording in the mappings for Goal [FHIR-23047](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-23047).
3) Add clarification in the mapping that printed name and name elements would include the same information [FHIR-23058](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-23058) and [FHIR-23059](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-23059).
4)Update the .system values in the CarePlan and Planner examples [FHIR-24901](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-24901).
5) Update the

for ServiceRequest.locationReference [FHIR-28148](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-28148).
6) Add explanatory text to the Location profile on the Profile page [FHIR-28149](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-28149).
7) Include a link to a downloadable eLTSS to FHIR mapping spreadsheet [FHIR-28237](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-28237).
8) Specify US Core version [FHIR-28236](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-28236).

Continuous Integration Build (latest in version control). This update addresses the following Jira trackers that were deemed by the HL7 CBCP WG to be non-substantial changes:
1) Add clarification text to CarePlan.partOf.comment [FHIR-23046](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-23046).
2) Clarify wording in the mappings for Goal [FHIR-23047](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-23047).
3) Add clarification in the mapping that printed name and name elements would include the same information [FHIR-23058](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-23058) and [FHIR-23059](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-23059).
4)Update the .system values in the CarePlan and Planner examples [FHIR-24901](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-24901).
5) Update the

for ServiceRequest.locationReference [FHIR-28148](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-28148).
6) Add explanatory text to the Location profile on the Profile page [FHIR-28149](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-28149).
7) Include a link to a downloadable eLTSS to FHIR mapping spreadsheet [FHIR-28237](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-28237).
8) Specify US Core version [FHIR-28236](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-28236).
